bill.summary:
Women's Rights and Protection Act of 2023
This bill prohibits expending federal funds to provide assistance to any country that has enacted laws that criminalize or discriminate on the basis of gender, including laws that limit or prohibit women from attending school or that authorize female genital mutilation.
